fullplot: Bobby O'Grady is a low range member of Boston Irish gang run by Jackie O'Hara. Jackie demands absolute, total loyalty for him. When Jackie kills one of Bobby's buddies, Teddy, Bobby and others have to keep it an absolute secret, even from their and Teddy's relatives.
plot: A small time hoodlum is divided between his conscience and loyalty to his boss when his cousin is murdered.
title: Monument Ave.
